result.title: Бинарный перебор
result.content:
code
cin >> n;
for (llong q = 1; q <= pow (2, n); q ++, cout << '\n') {
    for (llong i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {
        cout << a[i];
    } llong pos = n;
    for (llong i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {
        if (!a[i]) {
            pos = i;
        }
    } a[pos] = 1;
    for (llong i = pos + 1; i <= n; i ++) {
        a[i] = 0;
    }
}
